title: Canada Bankruptcies
description: Bankruptcies in Canada decreased to 206 Companies in September from 223 Companies in August of 2022. Bankruptcies in Canada averaged 344.48 Companies from 2004 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 872 Companies in March of 2004 and a record low of 108 Companies in April of 2020. In Canada, bankruptcies account for insolvent corporations who cannot repay their debts to creditors and carry on with their business. This page provides - Canada Bankruptcies - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Canada
